backend/main.mo: Defines data models and initial book list for meditation, journaling, progress tracking, and user profiles within the main backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of key frontend files and their roles in the app’s UI, routing, and logic.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Explains required tools and steps for redeploying the frontend and backend without code changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template for diagnosing deployment issues across install, build, deploy, and runtime stages.
frontend/index.css: Defines root theme variables, dark mode overrides, and Tailwind base styles for app theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with a shim for process.env and global error handlers before loading the React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up app-wide providers and TanStack Router routes for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel component offering ambient sound selection with audio playback, swipe navigation, and volume control.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that captures exceptions, logs details, and displays a full‑screen error UI with reload option.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Destructive alert banner showing sync/load errors with a retry button and loading state.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical nav bar with hover labels and navigation to core app sections.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile sidebar menu providing theme toggle, auth state handling, navigation, and logout logic.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Paginated book-style content viewer with swipe, keyboard navigation, animated transitions, and auto-scroll.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Circular carousel for selecting knowledge categories with swipe and keyboard navigation.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Quiz dialog presenting shuffled questions with progress, back/next navigation, scoring, and results display.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus flower model that animates petals, glow, and stem based on growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Three.js particle system that animates chaotic or coherent particle motion around the lotus depending on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas-based particle and lotus animation that adapts visibility and glow effects based on theme, variant, and intensity.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Swipeable carousel for selecting meditation types with centered scaling, circular navigation, and touch controls.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Step-by-step meditation guide with swipe navigation, animated transitions, and optional benefits parsing.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Animated circular progress ring using canvas with wave effects, glow, and theme‑adaptive colors.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Canvas-based vertical fill indicator with animated waves and smooth progress interpolation.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that navigates to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Page wrapper that renders a themed LotusCanvas background behind its children.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-based animated bowl visual that fills proportionally to totalMinutes with theme-based colors and glow effects.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: Three.js lotus visualization that adjusts model and particles based on growthState and supports orbit rotation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: Animated SVG lotus whose petals, glow, and colors react to totalMinutes, streak, and theme using a growth model.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Five‑question quiz dialog that collects user answers and computes a recommended meditation type.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal listing up to five saved rituals with a carousel for starting or deleting them.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Swipeable carousel for browsing, launching, and deleting saved rituals with icons and confirm dialogs.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: UI indicator showing guest or authenticated state with actions to return home or log out.
Navigation component providing theme toggle, back button, session indicator, and mobile menu elements with mount-aware rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identity, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Timer hook for meditation sessions handling countdown, pause, seeking, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for meditation data, supporting guest storage, backend calls, and mock fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, light/dark OKLCH color variables, base styles, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a typed list of book recommendations with titles, descriptions, tags, icons, and Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Defines interfaces and structured content for meditation techniques, including pages of text and quiz questions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
Empty page placeholder with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays a swipeable carousel of book recommendations with theme toggling and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with quotes, meditation selection, rituals, quiz dialog, and theme controls.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Renders the journal list with search, filtering, editing, deletion, favorite toggling, and import/export actions using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Displays meditation knowledge content with category navigation, deep-link scrolling, theme toggle, and quiz functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen with theme toggle, login flow via Internet Identity, guest mode, and redirect logic for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Pre-meditation setup page for selecting mood, energy, guidance, music, and recording meditation sessions and journal entries.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Shows user progress, ranks, streaks, and stats with a progress bowl visualization plus data import/export handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Defines standardized cloud sync error codes and maps backend errors to user-friendly messages, plus readiness checks for actor and identity.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Handles serialization and deserialization of backend data to a safe JSON export/import format, including version checks and bigint-safe conversions.
Manages quiz score storage in localStorage per principal, with hooks for retrieving and saving scores.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes lotus growth visualization parameters based on total meditation minutes using phased thresholds and smooth interpolation.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Provides guest-only localStorage handling for journal entries, progress data, and rituals with legacy key migration.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers mapped to total meditation minutes and utilities for retrieving current, next, and display-ready rank info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom color palette using OKLCH variables, extended shadows, radii, and plugin setup. It defines content paths, container settings, and extensive theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata for a meditation app, including features, new requests, and project state versioning. Tracks requirements for a back button and an animated wave-style timer indicator.
